document.heading: TARGETED WARD 4 SINGLE SALES MORATORIUM AND NEIGHBORHOOD GROCERY RETAILER ACT OF 2008.

history.narrative: Law 17-324, the “Targeted Ward 4 Single Sales Moratorium and Neighborhood Grocery Retailer Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-941 which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 2, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-629 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-324 became effective on March 21, 2009.
